heading: HB02364
0: AN ACT MANDATING ALL LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS AND THE APPROPRIATE DEPARTMENTS AND AGENCIES TO DESIGNATE ONE CARPOOL LANE IN ALL ROADS OR THOROUGHFARES WITH AT LEAST FOUR VEHICULAR LANES WITHIN ITS JURISDICTION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-07-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02364
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING ALL LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS AND THE APPROPRIATE DEPARTMENTS AND AGENCIES TO DESIGNATE ONE CARPOOL LANE IN ALL ROADS OR THOROUGHFARES WITH AT LEAST FOUR VEHICULAR LANES WITHIN ITS JURISDICTION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
